processo_subtitulo: How I turn ideas into reality
processo_card1_desc: I understand the requirements, define the scope, and plan the architecture to ensure a solid and scalable foundation.
processo_card2_desc: I create intuitive interfaces and interactive prototypes focused on the best end-user experience.
processo_card3_desc: I code the solution using modern technologies, clean code, and tests to ensure quality and performance.
processo_card4_desc: I deploy the application to production environments and monitor it to ensure stability and make continuous improvements.
home_descricao: Experienced in React, React Native, and Node.js, focused on creating modern, responsive, and high-performance interfaces.
sobre_paragrafo: Developer with hands-on experience in React.js, React Native, and Node.js. Focused on creating intuitive and efficient user experiences. Familiar with code versioning using GitHub and agile methodologies, committed to delivering high-quality products.
projetos_p1_desc: Interactive streaming platform with a movie catalog, favorite list, ratings, and comments.
